input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Men's Polo Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Discover the perfect blend of comfort, quality, and style with our men's knit polos collection.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Tommy Bahama Men's Harbor Isles Polo'
  - Name='The Normal Brand Waffle Stitch Polo'
  - Name='Vineyard Vines Men's Bradley Stripe Sankaty Polo'
  - Name='Theory Men's Goris Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Tie Bar Premium Men's Wrinkle-Free Dress Shirt Standard Fit Pinpoint Solid'
  - Name='The Tie Bar Men's Tipped Cotton Sweater Polo'
  - Name='Tie Bar Men's Ribbed Cotton Polo'
  - Name='The Tie Bar Men's Ribbed Cotton Sweater Polo'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Delta Pique Polo'
  - Name='Rhone Men's WFH Knit Polo'
  - Name='AllSaints Men's Organic Cotton Reform Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Series Spread Collar Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Boss Men's Cotton Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Jersey Polo'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Stretch Microstripe Golf Polo'
  - Name='The Tie Bar Men's Rope Jacquard Full Placket Polo'
  - Name='Men's Tie Bar Matte Color Black Tie Pin'
  - Name='Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic Fit Polo Bear Mesh Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Burberry Men's Cotton Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Billy Reid Men's Pensacola Polo'
  - Name='scotch & Soda Men's Regular-Fit Structured Knit Polo'
  - Name='Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic-Fit Mineral-Dyed Jersey T-Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Long-Sleeve Piqu√© Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Uniqlo Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Dry Pique Short Sleeve Polo Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tommy Bahama Men's Harbor Isles Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a men's polo shirt made by a well-known brand, fitting closely with the reference product's style and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Normal Brand Waffle Stitch Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: It's explicitly a polo shirt, similar in construction and purpose to the reference men's knit polo.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vineyard Vines Men's Bradley Stripe Sankaty Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: As a men's polo, this product shares core features and function with the reference polo shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Theory Men's Goris Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's polo shirt alike in design and user intent to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tie Bar Premium Men's Wrinkle-Free Dress Shirt Standard Fit Pinpoint Solid
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Though a men's shirt from the same brand, it is a dress shirt, not a polo, differing in silhouette and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Tie Bar Men's Tipped Cotton Sweater Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: It's a polo shirt with sweater knit construction, related but slightly different in fabric weight and style from a typical polo.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tie Bar Men's Ribbed Cotton Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's cotton polo from the same brand; essentially identical in category and purpose to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Tie Bar Men's Ribbed Cotton Sweater Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to a polo but with sweater knit construction, slightly deviating from the classic polo shirt fabric type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Delta Pique Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pique knit polo shirt very similar functionally and stylistically to the reference men's knit polo.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's WFH Knit Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A knit polo designed for men's casual wear, aligning well with the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: AllSaints Men's Organic Cotton Reform Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An organic cotton men's polo shirt aligning closely with the reference product's features and usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Series Spread Collar Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's polo shirt with a performance fabric focus, similar in style and silhouette to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Boss Men's Cotton Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton polo shirt for men matching closely in construction and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Jersey Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A jersey knit polo shirt for men, very similar to the reference men's knit polo shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Stretch Microstripe Golf Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's golf polo with stretch fabric, functionally and stylistically similar to the reference knit polo.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Tie Bar Men's Rope Jacquard Full Placket Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A polo shirt with jacquard knit patterning from the same brand, close but slightly different texture from standard knit polos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Tie Bar Matte Color Black Tie Pin
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is an accessory (tie pin), not apparel, so completely irrelevant to the polo shirt reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic Fit Polo Bear Mesh Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's polo with decorative mesh bear design; core product category matches but with added decorative elements.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Burberry Men's Cotton Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's cotton polo shirt matching the reference product's material and style closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Billy Reid Men's Pensacola Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's polo shirt similar in silhouette, construction, and intended use to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: scotch & Soda Men's Regular-Fit Structured Knit Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Structured knit polo shirt for men very similar in construction and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Classic-Fit Mineral-Dyed Jersey T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Though a men's top, this is a T-shirt rather than a polo, differing in collar and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Long-Sleeve Piqu√© Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A polo shirt, but long-sleeve instead of the typical short-sleeve; still closely related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Uniqlo Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A general polo shirt for men, fitting well with the reference's core characteristics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Uniqlo Men's Dry Pique Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve pique knit polo shirt for men, highly aligned with the reference product.
